website_summaries.verdict: This square, sturdy tool lifts cakes that are up to 12 inches.
pros: Non-slip handle made of ABS over TPE
Lifts cookies, pizzas, and sandwiches, too
Great for moving cake from decorating turntable to cake stand
Blade edge is thin, so it's perfect for slipping under cakes
cons: A little too flexible for cheesecakes

customer_reviews.title: Indispensable tool
customer_reviews.text: This cake lifter is truly indispensable for me. After I decorate cakes on a turntable I need to transfer them to a plate or cake stand. Prior to getting this cake lifter I was having to use a large spatula, which was an accident waiting to happen because it was neither large nor sturdy enough to safely lift the cake, even though my cake was on a cake board. The cake lifter is strong and comfortable to use and easy to clean. Considering the cost and time involved in making and decorating a cake and the fact that you're usually doing it for a special occasion, this cake lifter in my opinion is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Finally an 8 in bench scraper
customer_reviews.text: I searched all over Amazon for a bench scraper wider than 6 inches and couldn't find one until I learned that the bigger ones that TV chefs use are cake lifters. This is sturdy stainless steel with a nice soft handle of ABS (Acrylonitrile butadiene styrene) over TPE (Thermoplastic elastomers) or in less scientific terms plastic and rubberized plastic. It's plenty big enough for a counter full of chopped veggies and is dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Necessary Tool
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these to help lift a 12” cake, but only one was necessary. I just use one hand to hold the lifter and the other hand to support the little bit of cake that hangs out. It was definitely what I needed after I recently cracked a 12” cake trying to lift it other ways. I did coat it in half cornstarch and half powdered sugar just to be on the safe side. It’s definitely a necessary tool if your cakes aren’t firm enough to hold with your bare hands or get stuck on the cake boards.
customer_reviews.author: Jewels84

customer_reviews.title: A Sturdy One Handed Wonder !
customer_reviews.text: Cake !! I could lift a pizza with this....wow, this is a sturdy one handed wonder!! Let me start lifting things right away. :) I can imagine using this to scoop chopped onions and garlic from the cutting board to the pan, as well as many other things. I can always count on Wilton for great products. All my baking pans are Wilton, have never regretted a Wilton purchase! Shipped quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Art and Soul

customer_reviews.title: I can easily "release" a cake from the Springform pan bottom & ...
customer_reviews.text: As a home baker who prefers using Springform pans, I really appreciate this cake lifter! I can easily "release" a cake from the Springform pan bottom & place it on a serving plate. Not a life-saver, but a wonderful product if you do a lot of cake-baking.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Q.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I've been baking cakes for so long without this! This helped so much with transferring my cakes. It's easy to hold and the pefect width and length. Made moving 10 inch round cakes with a breeze and helpful when you need to stack. It is sturdy and I feel it will keep for many uses to come.
customer_reviews.author: Rena

customer_reviews.title: And excellent cake lifter and a very good general size
customer_reviews.text: I have had stainless dough separators before, but this one is truly a big one, for bigger cakes or to get your hands a little distance on smaller cakes. I am not making too many 16 inch cakes but this works better with smaller cakes as well and gives me greater confidence in handling them safely. I wonder how I did without this for so long? I am glad I have it now.
customer_reviews.author: Cajun GourmetTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: A great addition to any chef kit.
customer_reviews.text: Added this to my chef knife kit because the normal scraper I used always spilled stiff when I overloaded it. I am super glad I did! It works super well and holds much more per scrape because of the cup area. Didn't think it would make such a difference, but for fast and efficient food prep it actually will be an asset to anyone. It has a tapered edge that gives it a sharpness that could probably be enhanced, but it might just make it dangerous. I'm sure it's great for dough cutting, although I have yet to use it for that.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Rod

customer_reviews.title: If you bake cake you need this!
customer_reviews.text: Such a good product! I lifted and moved the bottom tier of a birthday cake (made of two 12" marble cakes) with no problem and no incident. Moving the smaller cakes were "a piece of cake." This has made my life so much easier!
customer_reviews.author: Sha

customer_reviews.title: Flexible edge, not stiff.
customer_reviews.text: Can't rate it because it is a gift, but I do not like that it has a flexible edge. I thought being a blade it would be sharp and strong and a hard surface, it is not, it is bendable. How is it going to be used to scrape and cut if it bends? It is soft plastic, not sure yet if I will keep it ...?
customer_reviews.author: CCB

customer_reviews.title: Handy little gadget!
customer_reviews.text: I was a tad skeptical when I first saw this item. Out if the box it is a little on the small side, not looking like it could hold a full size cake. Well it sure changed my mind quickly! It easily picked up and moved a full 9" two layer fully frosted and decorated cake. If you do a lot of baking, this handy little tool is for you! Every kitchen should have one. And I even use it to lift frozen pizza into and out of oven.
customer_reviews.author: amanda kay

customer_reviews.title: Wilton 2103-307 Cake Lifter [8-inch]
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Wilton 8-inch stainless steel cake lifter for my wife to use for her baking. She says it is well made and a good size for her layer cakes and also uses it for things like dividing dough balls when making larger batches of breads, biscuits and rolls. For what it cost I think it was a good value and would purchase again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: SJK

customer_reviews.title: Nice scraper!
customer_reviews.text: Ya...it's not metal...but I don't have to worry about damaging my counter top, baking mat or mixing bowls. Is a useful tool and I've used it quite a bit to help me shape and cut dough for pizza and pastries...and never worry about it scratching anything. Ruler is nice too for helping to lay out dough accurately. Pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: This is a must one piece spatula for all your kitchen spatula needs!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a nice red one to look good in my utensil jar and to compliment my red kitchen aid mixer. This is a good looking and sleek spatula. Aside looks, it's also very functional. It's one for all use type of spatula, meaning you don't need more than this one. It's a good mid size, and can do about anything you need a spatula to do. I also dislike two piece ones, they grow mood easily where the handle comes off, no matter how well you care for it. I learned my lesson to only buy one piece spatulas!
customer_reviews.author: IA Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Great for Multiple uses!
customer_reviews.text: I love this--lift your cake, lift a bunch of your cookies all at once and you can even use this to smooth a larger cake! Very versatile.. I don't know how I lived so long without it. Works well when transferring cakes. I may buy a 2nd one just for this purpose alone so cakes don't fall apart. :)
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing!
customer_reviews.text: I like the ability to lift a cake without tearing it. I don't think it is well made! It wobbles, which means it will not last long! Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: carolintallahassee

customer_reviews.title: Premium quality
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say; this is the definitive, lifetime spatula. Not a huge price premium. I particularly like the blend of flexibility and backbone on this thing.
customer_reviews.author: billwilloughby

customer_reviews.title: A bench scraper that doesn't scrap
customer_reviews.text: The good news; it won't scrap your quartz / stone counter top. The bad; It doesn't slide under the dough. So what is the point of a bench scraper that doesn't scrap the bench.
customer_reviews.author: Mark J.

customer_reviews.title: I’m no pastry chef but it helps!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for its purpose. Note the size, however. I have bigger hands than most women; if you have small hands you might want to buy a smaller one.
customer_reviews.author: Charioteer

customer_reviews.title: A Must for Any Dedicated Baker
customer_reviews.text: This bakers blade is a very handy tool to have in the kitchen; and is of excellent quality. I've used it in transferring cakes & other baked items; smoothing icing on a cake, & cutting unbaked cinnamon rolls to place on pan. I am very happy with my Wilton's Bakers Blade!
customer_reviews.author: Diana L. Boehnke

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a good gift for someone who makes a lot of cakes
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my cousin in law because she makes a lot of birthday cakes for family and she usually just makes her own diy cake lifter and they have failed her once or twice so I got her this as a gift and she loves it. Definitely a good gift for someone who makes a lot of cakes.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Great scraper and is well worth it’s price.
customer_reviews.text: This scraper is well made and does a great job chopping and etc. I liked it so much that I purchased another one for my brother!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Works so well when transferring cakes from turn table to a cake stand! Sturdy, easy to clean, easy to use. And great size
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Dickson

customer_reviews.title: Great product for Bakers much easier than trying to pick up a cake any other way
customer_reviews.text: My daughter does a ton of baking and has a small business doing that also. She loves this product it helps with moving cakes much easier
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.  Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This product is very easy to use. It cleans very easy. It feels good in the hand. I expect to get many years of use out of this purchase. It is going to make baking pizza and cakes easier to handle. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Janet515

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for KitchenAid mixer bowl...
customer_reviews.text: This scraper is perfect for lifting dry and damp ingredients off the bottom of the KitchenAid bowl and into the mix ...but not with the mixer running! This also works well for hand mixing batters for nut breads and scraping all the batter into the baking dish.
customer_reviews.author: Zoo Keeper

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Durable!  Very versatile!
customer_reviews.text: So many uses for this thing. You can scrape bowls, decorate cakes, stir things, spank a kids butt ... naw but for real, it's silicon and can withstand high temps with an economical design. One more thing... This is the LONGEST lasting silicon tool I have ever owned. I bought this same model 5 years ago and is just now starting to fail. Had to buy two more!
customer_reviews.author: floydstime

customer_reviews.title: Very handy for sticky doughs
customer_reviews.text: As with all Wilton products, this one works great and is easy to care for. I saw a video of scrapers in use and never realized how handy they are, especially with sticky dough and silicone rolling surfaces. Definitely recommend for all bread bakers!
customer_reviews.author: shoppersusy

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy.
customer_reviews.text: It is study and string. However it’s a big too chunky and takes up space in my drawer. It also feels heavy and sharp in the edge. I only have used once and wish I didn’t buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Mills

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This product is very sturdy and works well I highly recommend it an has more then one use it’s a must have if you love to bake
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Aivles

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably large flat surface with handle to lift items
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. It is a flat piece of stainless steel with a handle on it.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald T. Abrahamson

customer_reviews.title: Very handy kitchen tool
customer_reviews.text: I've taken to baking a lot lately and I didn't have one of these. Wow, what a helpful tool! There have been SO many occasions I find myself reaching for it. SO HANDY! Like an oversized bench scraper, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Gwenn

customer_reviews.title: I have been using a long discontinued dough scraper that fit very nicely into the bowl of my Kitchenaid stand mixer
customer_reviews.text: I see that this is one of those VERY misleading review groupings that combines the reviews for FIFTEEN totally different products. This is for the Wilton Silicone Spoon Scraper. I have been using a long discontinued dough scraper that fit very nicely into the bowl of my Kitchenaid stand mixer. Every replacement I have found is at least an inch too large in both length & width. I bought this in a last-ditch effort to find something I can use to scrape the dough down as I mix. I used it for the first time today & it actually works better than the scraper it replaces.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry41

customer_reviews.title: Works better as chopped veggie scraper
customer_reviews.text: I found the leading edge of this scraper to be too soft to really scrape dough off a work surface like wood or stone. Just leaves too much of a trail of drying residue. My metal scraper scrapes cleanly and leaves no residue whatsoever. I have re-purposed this as a veggie scraper---after chopping, I use this to scoop up veggies. It works very well for that task!
customer_reviews.author: ceebee

customer_reviews.title: This spoon is great! especially if you cook a lot
customer_reviews.text: This spoon is great ! especially if you cook a lot. They will withstand hot temps I think it said 450 degrees on the package. And I have used this spoon for scraping, and stirring hot food also . I bought a smaller one at the same time, and it is great for scraping out jars, or get the last bit of food out of the tubs , or jars. If you want to give a new cook a nice gift that she will fall in love with, get her a set of these.
customer_reviews.author: shasha0518

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is so easy to use and store and clean...it's just perfect for the novice baker
customer_reviews.author: LaytonM

customer_reviews.title: Your going to need this eventually.
customer_reviews.text: Once you have this you’ll find dozens of uses and kick yourself for not getting one sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Chryslerpetz

customer_reviews.title: Essential tool for a stand mixer
customer_reviews.text: This is a "must" for Stand Mixers. It is very handy for scraping the contours of the bowl. I also find it useful when the beater is turning to put it in backwards (the opposite way of the curvature of the scraper so that the back side of the scraper is facing the beater). I know it doesn't seem logical but when used this way it pushes whatever you are mixing down into the bowl while the beater is in motion. The fact that it can sit on the counter without a spoon rest is a nice extra.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Great Versatile Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product for my Instant Pot Fat Daddio 8” cheesecakes. Makes removing the cake from the parchment paper a breeze. Also great for moving chopped veggies to the pan you are using!
customer_reviews.author: Preston R. Savell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Well made
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Well made. Sturdy with just the right amount of flex. I bought it mostly for scooping up vegetables after chopping for soup, etc., and for helping to roll pie dough around a rolling pin before placing on pie plate. Good cake lifter, too. A very handy little device.
customer_reviews.author: Jim D.

customer_reviews.title: Searched for this specifically!
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased my original spatula at a retail store, can't remember where. I loved it so much that I wanted more. I was so happy to find it on Amazon! I purchased multiples and I use them daily in my everyday food prep. Great proportion, great flexibility! My original spatula is years old and looks as good as the brand new.
customer_reviews.author: cfnorth

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for picking up diced vegetables, etc. I use it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Jose A. Alonso

customer_reviews.title: The best thing to have in your kitchen
customer_reviews.text: It its the best thing to have in your kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: don't know why I'm so excited about this tool. :)
customer_reviews.text: Since purchasing a year ago, this has become my absolute favorite scraper for batters, soft biscuit-type doughs, and even stiff bread doughs. In other words, anything I need to scrape out of a bowl. I don't know what it is about the shape, but it just works. Liked it so much I bought two more to gift to friends. Well made and shows no wear even after dozens of trips through the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Girls like Makita, too.

customer_reviews.title: Lasted one year so far without any damage from heat ...
customer_reviews.text: Lasted one year so far without any damage from heat. The color is not a clean red anymore but otherwise no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Domestic Goddess

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: No more hoping that I don't drop a layer or even a cake. The cake lifter is big enough to handle single and multiple layers. Easy to use and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Gayl Ray

customer_reviews.title: Good for size.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Slides under my cheese cake well. I just wish it was 10 inches to fit under 9 in cakes better. But I'm impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Boyd

customer_reviews.title: This is more sturdy than I expected for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is more sturdy than I expected for the price. So much easier than my clumsy method of 2 spatulas and a little precarious balancing act I used to do.
customer_reviews.author: Michael GrantTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Wilton 8" cake Lifter
customer_reviews.text: Works great. My wife makes a cream cheese pastry that is about 18" long and was very hard to pick this up off the worktable to place on the baking stone and this little tool has solved the problem Two of the used together work great and store easily.
customer_reviews.author: Eric J. Kolber

customer_reviews.title: Durable, sturdy, remember it’s 8”, I love this product.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this product for cake lifting. It’s awesome. Purchased the cake rings to get even layers and I love that product too. These work well together.
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: I also buy other baking product brands but if it's something like I will use for a long time
customer_reviews.text: I a a fan of Wilton products. I also buy other baking product brands but if it's something like I will use for a long time, I buy Wilton. This product is solid and will last a lifetime a guess from the feel of it.
customer_reviews.author: Wallflower

customer_reviews.title: Useful in the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use to lift chopped items off chopping board and it works very well
customer_reviews.author: EARL BARNES

customer_reviews.title: sucks
customer_reviews.text: It is very pretty but the silicone that on the bottom of the cutter is way too soft, can not cut thru bread dough. Mom hated it. Had to buy another one
customer_reviews.author: Bao

customer_reviews.title: Great to have in your wheelhouse
customer_reviews.text: I use this for calzones, stromboli or any creation that needs a lift. Great to have in your wheelhouse.
customer_reviews.author: anne

customer_reviews.title: Best cake tool!
customer_reviews.text: This cake lift has helped me so much moving and lifting a cold, hot, and warm cake with no cake cracking or falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Valencia

customer_reviews.title: Great scraper with useful ruler
customer_reviews.text: This is a great dough scraper. I use this when making breads, biscuits, cookies, and whatever else I've been rolling out to bake. I do wish the side with the ruler was a little more rigid, but this is a fantastic scraper for the price. The rule is very useful as I have no concept of height when I'm making biscuits or scones or whatever.
customer_reviews.author: FaeryKiss

customer_reviews.title: Best Spoon Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This rubber spoon is wonderful! It works equally well for baking and cooking because the soft, (extremely) flexible edges remove food from the side of the bowl or a hot sauté pan perfectly. It's best feature though is one that you would never think you need. The end of the handle is pliable and it doesn’t dig into the palm of the hand when stirring anything for an extended period of time. Plus, it's dishwasher safe. I'm so taken with this spoon I bought two more for my home kitchen and a bunch to tie into the ribbons on birthday gifts for friends/family who cook.
customer_reviews.author: TCas

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect. I hae had others but they have all been the type with the plastic attached at the bottom of the stick. This caused bacteria and food to get into the plastic part. When I saw this design I was so glad and bought it immediately. I haven't had any issues with it and love that I don't have to pull it apart to clean. Vary happy
customer_reviews.author: Amy Griswold

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bread making
customer_reviews.text: Nice scraper at a good price. Perfect for bread making.
customer_reviews.author: gorDelpus

customer_reviews.title: ... use it as a food mover and it works great.
customer_reviews.text: I use it as a food mover and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really makes bread making easy--it is the perfect size, very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Really makes bread making easy--it is the perfect size, very sturdy, and easy to hold on to while turning and lifting bread dough!
customer_reviews.author: D. Dominick

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for Pie Making
customer_reviews.text: The typical baker's bench knife is only about 6" wide--not near enough to support the lifting of a rolled out crust of 12" diameter, even when folded, to fit into a standard 9" pie pan. This Wilton bench knife/Lifter is 8" square and easily accommodates a single fold pie crust for 9" pans. I also use it for cutting scones. It works great in both applications!
customer_reviews.author: Classic Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic bench and dough scraper. The measurements come in handy in my Culinary Practicum as it allows for me to do exact cuts. The only reason it's not 5 stars is that it states that it is also a bowl scraper, but unless the bowl is large, fitting the scraper into the bowl can prove difficult and problematic, making the need for a bowl scraper still a thing.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: recommend
customer_reviews.text: i got this because i got tired of trying to dip spoons or butter knives in large deep jars and getting the contents all over my hands and everywhere else that it's not suppose to be. this works well for getting to the bottom of that tall peanut butter jar and not having it all over my hands or the jar itself.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great Spatula
customer_reviews.text: My hubby lost my previous spatula like this one, so I ordered this to replace it. I didn't realize that this is much larger than the one it replaced, but I'm glad it is, because there have been occasions where only a spatula of this size would do! It's all one piece, and I'm sure it will last a lifetime. Glad I got it.
customer_reviews.author: CarolynCAG

customer_reviews.title: wish it was bigger and longer
customer_reviews.text: works great, cleans easy, its pretty sturdy i just wish it was longer
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Talk about a great product to make your cooking easier because it had multiple uses!
customer_reviews.author: Templeladee

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed in a cake lifter. Its sturdy enough that I feel comfortable carrying cakes around on it, and its super easy to use for a great price. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best!
customer_reviews.text: i have a lot of spatulas, but this one is the best I've ever had! it's firm enough to not bend too easily and yet flexible enough to for my needs. the handle could be a little longer, but I can live with this as long as it works as well as it does.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Kay

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: That is the best word for this tool! Can't wait to use it. I will be able to flip my cakes onto this lifter and then flip into saran wrap to put into the freezer. I will also be able to use it to pick up pizza, strudel dough, etc. I can see this is going to be a must have in my kitchen that I've been missing!
customer_reviews.author: Smiles-n-Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Great Piece of Kitchen Equipment
customer_reviews.text: How have I gone through life without one of these?! They do so much more than lift cakes!!
customer_reviews.author: calf

customer_reviews.title: High quality.
customer_reviews.text: High quality and great kitchen for lifting chopped foods from the chopping board.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Gates

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and won't scrape your bowls or countertop like a metal one will.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Jordan

customer_reviews.title: well made tool , but
customer_reviews.text: Nice tool but too rigid to be a bowl scraper and leading edge is too soft to effectively scrape a work surface. I'm sure I'll find a use for it, perhaps as a frosting spatula
customer_reviews.author: rcooper

customer_reviews.title: Well made and handy.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice as all Wilton products are. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: M. Vesley

customer_reviews.title: Never used it for lifting cakes
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for slicing. The edge is very thin therefore it slices easily.
customer_reviews.author: K&J

customer_reviews.title: I didn't use it to lift cakes.
customer_reviews.text: I use it to transfer chopped vegetables, or other chopped items to a sauté pan. It works well doing that.
customer_reviews.author: Reid Wood

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Accidentally bought two of these but actually kept both because it's even easier to transfer cakes with one on each side! Works much better than my old 3 spatulas routine which was precarious at best!
customer_reviews.author: A. ReneeTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Cake lifter
customer_reviews.text: This was a great help when my wife decided to make her first red velvet cheesecake. She had to slice the cake layers and the cheesecake in half and lift them apart to alternate the layers and this worked perfectly. She could not have done it without the cake lifter.
customer_reviews.author: cwp

customer_reviews.title: Cake lifter great
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed at the bakery for lifting brownies & pies
customer_reviews.author: Kathy A

customer_reviews.title: I love this tool
customer_reviews.text: I work in a restaurant and I use this cake lifter for every thing but cakes..I shovel vegetables into sauce pans Tilt skillets and so on ..fruits into containers. I love this tool..!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will not damage  silicone mat
customer_reviews.text: Shaping and cutting bread and pastry dough on a silicone mat
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: i like it but i don't really read the details of the product size, it smaller than i thought.
customer_reviews.author: june

customer_reviews.title: Such good quality
customer_reviews.text: This product is like a 2 in 1 you can use it to lift up cakes and you can use it as a bench scraper. This product is such good quality and such a reasonable price. One of the best $9 I’ve ever spent
customer_reviews.author: Rituparna B.

customer_reviews.title: Every baker needs one!
customer_reviews.text: This was a lifesaver when needing to transfer the different tiers of a 5-tier wedding cake from place to place. Very sturdy, easy to use and able to transfer the 14" cake with little effort or worry!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Welch

customer_reviews.title: Good quality dough scraper with measurements on it
customer_reviews.text: Good quality dough scraper with measurements on it. The measurements on it make it easier to cut certain sizes or measure widths while working with dough. The top thicker area makes it easier to handle/ hold while working with it.
customer_reviews.author: JulianeTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: A MUST in every kitchen!!
customer_reviews.text: Really... Really like this..I.use as an all purpose tool...stands the heat...great scraper...spreader...nice size for icing cakes and getting to the bottom of jars. I'm even thinking of adding it to all my wedding shower baskets...5 STARS
customer_reviews.author: lemontree

customer_reviews.title: Love this...
customer_reviews.text: Easy clean and heat resistant. What more could you want in a Scraper?
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie S. Fultz

customer_reviews.title: This was a life saver. I used it on ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a life saver. I used it on an 8 inch 4 layer cake and it didn't bend a bit. very well made. Keeps your fingers outa the icing.
customer_reviews.author: ADurham

customer_reviews.title: Great for stiff and heavy dough!
customer_reviews.text: I got this scraper specifically for making breads and other heavy dough. It works great, and I'm completely satisfied with it for that purpose! But if you're looking for something a little softer for, say, something like cake batter, you might want to use something else that is a little more flexible.
customer_reviews.author: Cmartcookie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this, use for cakes, taking pizza out of the oven.
customer_reviews.author: utility workers

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love that this is all one piece so many silicone pieces for the kitchen are metal or wooden in the handle & and has a separate silicone top which causes it to eventually separate from the base or causes the handles to get hot. This is 1 solid piece of silicone. Excellent price too!
customer_reviews.author: Nailah Malone

customer_reviews.title: Fairly good spoon.
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of using a flexible spoon for stirring scrambled eggs or other hot items. This one works fine, but I feel it is a bit flimbsy or I would have rated it higher. I also prefer one with a straight side and a curved side for getting into all corners of the pan.
customer_reviews.author: D. J. Bush

customer_reviews.title: A great way to move cake layers from the cooling rack ...
customer_reviews.text: A great way to move cake layers from the cooling rack to the decorator tray without the worry of breaking the cake.
customer_reviews.author: Kona coast

customer_reviews.title: Must-have for cake bakers
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I have no idea how I lived without it for so long. It's just such a great value for what it is. Anyone that makes cakes should invest in one for easy transfer when decorating.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC
customer_reviews.text: This gets the job done in a fraction of the time of using a regular spoon to scrape out a bowl. It covers a wide area. Love it so much I recently bought a spare one. Definitely recommend this. LOVE, LOVE, LOVE THIS!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin's Wife

customer_reviews.title: Cute and sturdy scraper
customer_reviews.text: Love this attractive scraper. Looks cute in my kitchen and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Laura H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job at moving a cake. Sturdy enough for heavier cakes as well.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Cake Saver!
customer_reviews.text: As described, does what it's supposed to do! Makes moving my decorated cakes much easier!
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Thing

customer_reviews.title: Thanks for a great product.
customer_reviews.text: I do not use this often but it sure comes in handy for a lot of things, not just to lift cakes. It was packed and shipped quickly and I received it in record time. Thanks for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

product_meta.title: Wilton Cake Lifter, 8-Inch
product_meta.description: Size:Cake LifterMove your cakes from the cooling rack without worry of breakage when you use this handy cake lifter. The comfort grip and sturdy, wide angled surface lets you lift not only cakes, but cookies, pizzas and sandwiches easily. You can also use it to scoop up chopped vegetables to add to a stir-fry pan, clean up cake crumbs or to remove cheesecake from a springform pan bottom, too.
feature_bullets: Lift cakes up to 12 inches easily and securely with this cake lifter
Before first and after each use, wash in warm, soapy water; rinse and dry thoroughly
Hard-to-lift cake layers are no problem for the Wilton Cake Lifter
Heavy-duty construction; stainless-steel blade; non-slip handle made from ABS over TPE
Perfect for lifting large and heavy cakes; measures 8 x 8 inches; weighs 12 ounces
Perfect for professionals and novice bakers alike
